resources.string: The User ID doesn\'t meet minimum requirements (not 6-16 characters, looks like an account number, or uses spaces or the following special characters: (\""), (\'), (\\)).
The password doesn\'t meet minimum requirements (not 8-32 characters, does not contain at least 1 letter and 1 number, or is the word \"password\").
Meets minimum requirements but does not include a variation of upper and lower case letters, numbers and special characters.
Meets minimum requirements and combines a variation of letters, numbers and special characters.
Meets minimum requirements and combines upper case letters, lower case letters, numbers, and special characters.
That works, but it could be stronger.
